Runtime.Architecture: DDD + Hexagonal; domain/application free of Spring/JPA/transport dependencies.

Database.Rules: Disable Open-Session-in-View; equals/hashCode by business key; optimistic locking with @Version.

Cache.Usage: Session carts (guest), cart summaries, idempotency tokens with TTL.

Messaging.Pattern: Transactional outbox for cart events; idempotent consumers.

External.Service: pricing-service for quotes; catalog-configuration-service for validation

Security.Auth: OAuth2/OIDC JWT; BUYER for customer carts; SERVICE for internal calls; ADMIN/SUPPORT for assisted carts.
Security.Validation: Bean Validation on DTOs; domain invariants for totals/idempotency.

Observability.Metrics: Micrometer + Prometheus; metrics: cart add/update latency, cache hit, abandoned count.
Observability.Tracing: OpenTelemetry; include cartId, customerId in spans.
Observability.Logging: Structured JSON with block anchors (CART-ADD-*, CART-TOTAL-*) for belief-state tracing.

Resilience.Retries: Circuit breakers/retries for transient failures; idempotent handlers.

Testing.Architecture: ArchUnit enforcing hexagonal boundaries and shared-kernel purity
